So she did not leave him, or he said: So she angered him. He said: I heard the Prophet ﷺ say: I looked into Paradise and saw the majority of its people are the poor. Then I looked into Hell and saw the majority of its people are women. Also, I stood at the gate of Paradise and saw the majority of its people are the poor, and I stood at the gate of Hell and saw the majority of its people are women. And behold, the people of understanding were prevented, except those among them who were of the people of Hell, for they were commanded to Hell.
